text: egh nguazir kam 3plan distrighbar da bɨkigh. Egh distrighɨn kabar vaghvagh mongamin nguibar ekiatam amɨsefegh, eghtɨ nguibar ekiar kaba, da danganir gumazamiziba arɨmangɨ deravɨra ikiamba. Egh tuavibar ingarightɨ, da nguibar ekiar kabar mangɨ dar otifigh. Eghtɨ gumazamiziba tuavir kabar arɨ mangɨ nguibar ekiar kabar otivigh deravɨra ikiam. Eghtɨ gɨn gumazitam igharazitav purama a mɨsueghtɨ an aremeghtɨ, a mangɨ nguibar kabar tamɨn aven mangɨ modogh ikiam.
